entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as having a rosy face and baby-blue eyes.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: The head of the Department of Magical Games and Sports. He is described as being impatient and smooth-faced.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, mentioned by Harry in conversation with Bagman.

relationships.description: Harry and Bagman are interacting with each other, discussing the clues for the game. Harry is careful to keep his voice casual, while Bagman is impatient.
Harry mentions Cedric in conversation with Bagman, asking if he has offered him help.
